Example.Name: TIMER_example
Example.Description: This example is NUC200 TIMER Driver Sample Code. [1] TIMER0/1/2/3 timeout interrupt and frequency test [2] Delay time by TIMER0 interrupt ticks test [3] TIMER1 External Counter Pin and Function test [4] TIMER1 External Capture Pin and Function test [5] Power Down and waken-up by TIMER2 interrupt event
